Hydras::

Hydras opened his comlink to  RockSeeker "What's your bussines with 
me???? you will pay your daring attack against Predacons!!!!"




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Rockseeker had already unloaded one clip of energy slugs and was 
> charging another one. His energon surge was showing in his attacks 
as 
> the Predacon shield was steadily weakening...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: This is a warning for anyone enganging Rockseeker. He is 
> really 
> > REALLY powerful, and he's on an energon surge. Be warned!
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> 
wrote:
> > > 
> > > Hydras::
> > > 
> > > Alarms ran inside Predacon's base, Hydras roared angerend and 
> > > checked whatwas going on when he saw that a bot was shooting 
> > against 
> > > the base he opended a com link to Tankor and SharpClaws "A bug 
> are 
> > > attaking our base... terminate him go with caoution could be a 
> > tramp"
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> 
wrote:
> > > > Rockseeker landed on top of the mountain. He transformed to 
his 
> > > > sturdy looking robot mode and looked around. The air was 
clear 
> > and 
> > > > fresh. This was a virgin planet, untouched by the ravages of 
> > > > civilization... yet. The Cybertronians posed a great threat 
to 
> > > that. 
> > > > It had to be dealt with.
> > > > 
> > > > That would be Lunekill's job. For now, he wanted to examine 
the 
> > > > Energon's quality. He lifted his fist in the air and took 
his 
> > > > momentum. He punched through the rocks and straight into a 
> > > deposit. 
> > > > Then, he grasped a big chunk of crystaline energon and took 
it 
> > > out. 
> > > > Appraising it like a jewel-crafter looking at a finely cut 
> > > diamond, 
> > > > he lifted it to his mouth and engulfed it whole.
> > > > 
> > > > The reaction was instantaneous and astonishing. It coursed 
> > through 
> > > > him as a power surge, making him feel like a powerhouse. Oh, 
> did 
> > > he 
> > > > love this sensation of power! It was the first time he had 
ever 
> > > > experienced something as strong as this! It did not stop 
here, 
> > > > though, as he would have expected. The surge built in him 
until 
> > he 
> > > > could no longer hold it back, then, with a crackling of 
static 
> > > > electricity, he literally blew the top of the mountain off. 
He 
> > > could 
> > > > no longer control his power surge! His feelings were 
amplified 
> > > > tenfolds. He was enraged!
> > > > 
> > > > No use for Lunekill, the Cybertronians would have to die now!
> > > > 
> > > > He flew away and, sensing a group of Predacons, stopped. He 
> > lifted 
> > > a 
> > > > double pulse gun and fired, again and again.
> > > > 
> > > > Rockseeker: Die, you oversized crawlers!
